description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has downloaded additional scripts, tools, and malware onto victim systems.(Citation: Crowdstrike GTR2020 Mar 2020)(Citation: Talos Kimsuky Nov 2021)

external_references.description: An, J and Malhotra, A. (2021, November 10). North Korean attackers use malicious blogs to deliver malware to high-profile South Korean targets. Retrieved December 29, 2021.
Crowdstrike. (2020, March 2). 2020 Global Threat Report. Retrieved December 11, 2020.
